data.message: Thank you for allowing us to be in touch with family and friend's thousand's of miles away!:) Love how I can be in Florida and chat with a friend in Africa!:) AMAZING!!!

replies.message: That's amazing, Roxanne! We love hearing stories of how Facebook helps connect friends from all over the world. -Abby

I actually meet Miguel in Haiti on a mission trip he was our interpreter an AMAZING young man.His parent's live in Africa and he went there to be with them a few year's ago and it's great to be able to stay in touch with him.I also have family in Thailand as missionaries and I get to keep up with all they are doing to:) LOVE ,LOVE FACEBOOK:)
